title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total assets in billion U.S.dollars, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Total assets in billion U.S.dollars has increased over the Year.

Total assets in billion U.S.dollars is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, and lastly slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Total assets in billion U.S.dollars about 2715.15 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Total assets in billion U.S.dollars about 2354.3 was recorded at Year 2007
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total assets in billion U.S.dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2016.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2012.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
